text: CORF Token Fixation (Flask-login + Flask-WTF) ﬁ Flask pot et https://bank.com https://atk.bank.com o POST /login ° Cookie: session={csrf:s, id:None} - user/password & csrf_token=t1 - Bab authenticates Welcome Bob! Set-Cookie: session={csrf:s, id:bob} POST /action i ° The CSRF secret s is not Cookie: session={csrf:s, id:bob} refreshed during login! - csrf_token=t@ The CSRF token t@ known by the attacker is valid for Bob's session!
